title: FS: Lot of St. Louis T-cards - Good, Fair condition
author: acowan19

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of St. Louis T-cards - Good, Fair condition
posts.post_content:
For sale are numerous T-cards of St. Louis players (mainly Cardinals).  They are prices individually though I would consider selling them as a lot.  Below are prices and pictures.  I haven't typed out details of conditions, letting the scans speak for themselves.  If you have any questions please PM.  I prefer Paypal.  Thank you!

T201 Double Folder Bresnahan/Huggins - $125/OBO  scuff is on holder, not on card, seen on reverse scan
[IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-k56w3hx/1/L/i-k56w3hx-L.jpg[/IMG]    [IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-sbtdG4B/1/L/i-sbtdG4B-L.jpg[/IMG]

T207 Ed Konetchy - $30/OBO  
[IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-z7MnTGH/0/L/i-z7MnTGH-L.jpg[/IMG]   [IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-3PTZBCs/0/L/i-3PTZBCs-L.jpg[/IMG]

T207 Hallihan - $15/OBO  
[IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-sNtJv5Z/0/L/i-sNtJv5Z-L.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-85cbNzh/0/L/i-85cbNzh-L.jpg[/IMG]

Turf Cigarettes (George Sisler) - $30/OBO  
[IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-vBtH76n/0/L/i-vBtH76n-L.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-tfgRbfn/0/L/i-tfgRbfn-L.jpg[/IMG]

Triple Folder Hauser/Konetchy - $50/OBO  card has crease down center but is whole (side panels connected)
[IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-N264ZFJ/0/L/i-N264ZFJ-L.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-XmP6LhD/0/L/i-XmP6LhD-L.jpg[/IMG]

Coupon Dots Miller - $40/OBO  
[IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-CzGXSDh/0/L/i-CzGXSDh-L.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-JPCZqdh/0/L/i-JPCZqdh-L.jpg[/IMG]
If anyone is interested in the lot of cards, I would be willing to sell the group for $220.
